bibliography.title: Atmospheric chemistry of 1,1,1,2-tetrachloroethane (CCl_3CH_2Cl): spectrokinetic investigation of the CCl_3CClHO_2 radical, its reactions with NO and NO_2, and atmospheric fate of the CCl_3CClHO radical
